cert.heading: CERTIFICATE OF COMPLETION
Institute title: Institute of Advanced Training and Additional Education
Institute subtitle: The Institute at Al-Farabi Kazakh National University has been providing advanced training and retraining in 40 areas and 390 specializations since 2002.
Upon successful completion of the traini: Upon successful completion of the training program at the Institute for Advanced Training and Continuing Education of Al-Farabi KazNU, participants receive an official state-recognized certificate. This document confirms your professional growth, the acquisition of new competencies, and your successful completion of a certified educational program. The certificate is officially recognized by universities, colleges, and educational institutions across Kazakhstan, as well as by public and private organizations. It demonstrates your commitment to lifelong learning and continuous development.
OUR PARTICIPANTS AND PARTNERS The Instit: OUR PARTICIPANTS AND PARTNERS The Institute for Advanced Training and Continuing Education of Al-Farabi KazNU collaborates with over 50 universities, colleges, schools, and organizations across Kazakhstan and abroad. Our programs attract participants from all regions of the country, as well as from international partner universities. Among our participants are ALMA University, Satbayev University, Toraighyrov University, Atyrau University, Dulaty University, Astana International University, and representatives from universities in Uzbekistan, Turkey, and Europe. Major companies and organizations such as RG Brands, KazTransOil, and Zolotoe Yabloko also take part in our training programs. The Institute maintains active partnerships with international institutions, enabling the exchange of experience, collaborative projects, and joint educational initiatives. Our growing network of listeners and partners reflects the Institute’s commitment to quality education, innovation, and global cooperation.

Our programs are offered in online and o: Our programs are offered in online and offline formats
Currently, installment payments are not: Currently, installment payments are not available
Programs are designed for teachers and p: Programs are designed for teachers and professionals
All applications are submitted via onlin: All applications are submitted via online form
How long do the programs last?: How long do the programs last?
faq_q1_answer: Our programs are offered in online and offline formats, allowing participants to study anytime and anywhere.
faq_q2_answer: Currently, installment payments are not available. Full payment is required, but flexible terms are provided for each program.
faq_q3_answer: Programs are designed for school teachers, college and university lecturers, civil servants, and professionals seeking to enhance their skills.
faq_q4_answer: All applications and documents are submitted via the online form. After registration, our manager will contact you with further details.
faq_q5_answer: Yes, online sessions are recorded and accessible to participants via a private link.
faq_q6_title: How long do the programs last?
faq_q6_answer: Short courses last from 72-80 academic hours, while extended programs go up to 144 hours.
faq_q7_answer: Yes, every participant receives an official state-recognized certificate after completing the course.
faq_q8_answer: Courses are delivered by experienced professors, associate professors, and industry experts from Al-Farabi KazNU.
